text: 2:26-28 Isei 2:8,9Maipakpa ngamlakpa amadi aroiba phaoba eigi aningba apamsing touba makhoising aduda eina Ipadagi phangkhiba chap mannaba matik adumak pibigani: Makhoina yotki leingakchei paiduna phurupsinggi mathakta pannaba amasung leipakki chaphu thugaibagum makhoibu machet tana thugainanaba matik pibigani. Eina makhoida nongan sajiksu pibigani.
